edu.uci.isr.impromptu.pie
Class Pie

java.lang.Object
  edu.uci.isr.impromptu.pie.Pie
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.w3c.dom.events.EventListener, MessageProcessor, PeerOwner
public class Pie
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.w3c.dom.events.EventListener, PeerOwner

This is the Pie client for the proxy. It connects to the Proxy, displays available files, using special properties (owner, level, position) it finds. It can also change these properties, when the user drags files. It allows user open files, using simple start/open command. The whole pie assumes a file with a certain name only belongs to one peer, so two peers cannot have files with the same name.

Author:
Jie Ren
